name: Follow Your Heart (itch)
description:
How to play: 

A-D | Left-Right Arrow Keys           W-S | Up-Down Arrow Keys

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game starts with a ghost avatar inside a building and this ghost is on a mission to look for three hearts to get a second chance to live. Along the journey, the ghost will be guided with candles that will give you clues to get on the right track to your next heart. The only way he can find all three hearts is by only following them in chronological order because each heart takes you to the designated room to find the next heart.

Animated tiles in this game are key components, make sure to pay attention and when in dought make sure to retreat your steps. Enjoy.
